testlib

Function reference

version 0.1.0

Cross Table

The cross_table() function is used to create two way tables of categorical data. It displays frequency, percent, row percent and column percent for each cell.

Two Way Tables

  • cross_table
  • cross_table.default

Bar Plot

Any two way table created using the cross_table() function can be visualized using the barplot method. The input for the barplot function must be an object of class cross_table.

Cross Table Bar Plot

  • plot.cross_table

Mosaic Plot

Any two way table created using the cross_table() function can be visualized using the mosaicplot method. The input for the mosaicplot function must be an object of class cross_table.

Mosaic Plot Cross Table

  • mosaicplot.cross_table

Data

testlib comes with a built-in dataset hsb which is used to illustrate the functions as well as for running tests.

High School and Beyond Data Set

  • hsb
